nodes.text: Ashes of Malachor was a consumable substance supposedly made by smugglers who found the lost planet of Malachor. The Ashes of Malachor were made from the pulverized bones of the Jedi and Sith who fought there many years before. The ashes had trapped dark essence within—which, if consumed, increased the consumer's dark side prowess and power at the cost of their own morality.
